body:
Comment 5: 
Simpler:

package main

var counter int

func next() int {
        c := counter
        counter++
        return c
}

var order = [2]int{b, a}
var a, b = next(), next() // 0, 1           

func main() {
	if order[0] != 1 || order[1] != 2 {
		println(order[0], order[1])
		panic("order")
	}
}
